mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_ID, U.USER_NAME, U.NICK_NAME, U.PROFILE_IMG_PATH, M.*, GM.*, GL.* FROM USERS U LEFT JOIN MEALS M ON(U.USER_ID = M.USER_ID) LEFT JOIN GROUP_MEMBER GM ON (M.USER_ID = GM.USER_ID) LEFT JOIN GROUP_LISTS GL ON (GM.NO = GL.NO) WHERE TRUNC(post_date) = TO_DATE(#{postDate},'yyyyMMdd') AND M.USER_ID = #{userId}
